thread.title: Rare 'lava firehose' from Hawaii's Kilauea volcano - BBC News
thread.title_full: Rare 'lava firehose' from Hawaii's Kilauea volcano - BBC News

title: Rare 'lava firehose' from Hawaii's Kilauea volcano - BBC News
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Rare 'lava firehose' from Hawaii's Kilauea volcano 1 February 2017 Last updated at 08:55 GMT 
The Kilauea volcano in Hawaii has been active since 1983, but scientists have filmed an unusual phenomenon. 
Dramatic footage shows lava as it flows through a crack in a sea cliff, and into the Pacific Ocean. Related Topics
